name: TALES FROM THE AGENCY: THE RONAN INCIDENT
name_original: TALES FROM THE AGENCY: THE RONAN INCIDENT
description:
Take on the role of a newly recruit operator and guide your spy through a foreign mansion as he attempts to complete his mission. All while dealing with the limitation of modern digital messaging. 

Features include: 

-Several endings

-Typos

Instructions: 

Drag blocks to the arrow to select them. Try to give orders to your agent that keep him alive. Or don't. 

Fullscreen is highly recommend (game looks better and you can read the text easily).
